instructions: walk past the bed and proceed to the bathroom . once in the bathroom , pause and wait in the doorway .
facing away from the table and chairs , walk through the dining room and come to a stop after passing the table and chairs .
proceed past the bed and enter the bathroom . come to a halt in front of the sink .
walk past the dining room table and chairs , and continue until you reach the kitchen table , turning left along the way .
starting at the kitchen entrance , move forward and turn right . continue walking past the dining room table and chairs until you reach the end of the table . stop and wait there .
walk through the living room and continue walking until you have passed the couch . then , come to a stop .
move in a reverse direction and pass by the bed . continue past the couch and make a right turn . proceed to walk to the right side of the bed and come to a halt .

turn your body away from the bed and take a few steps in the direction behind you . continue walking until you have passed the bed and reach the doorway . stop in the doorway once you have reached it .
walk past the dining table and chairs and continue through the bedroom until you reach the bed . then , walk past the bed and stop in the doorway of the bedroom .
stand facing away from the bed and walk towards the couch . continue walking past the couch and enter the room . stop and stand near the couch .
walk past the dining room table and chairs , making sure to turn right . then , continue walking until you reach the bottom of the stairs and wait there until further instruction .

first , turn around and begin walking away from the current location . then , continue walking past the bed and proceed past the couch . finally , come to a stop directly in front of the door in front of you .
to exit the room , turn to the right . walk past the dining room table and chairs until you reach the entrance to the bathroom . wait there until further instruction .

1 . turn around and face the door . 2 . walk towards the door and turn right . 3 . continue walking past the dining room table . 4 . walk past the couch and keep going until you reach the doorway leading to the bedroom . 5 . stop at the doorway and wait .
when you exit the room , make a right turn and walk past the dining room table and chairs . then , stop and wait near the tv .
to exit the bathroom , turn right and continue walking until you reach the dining room table and chairs . keep walking until you reach the couch and wait there .

after entering the room , turn around and walk straight ahead . then , make a right turn and continue walking until you pass the dining room table . continue walking until you reach the couch and then keep going until you reach the doorway to the bedroom . once there , wait for further instructions .
step 1: after using the bathroom , turn right and exit the room . step 2: continue walking straight , passing by the dining table and chairs . step 3: stop in front of the white chair and wait .

turn your body in the opposite direction and leave the bedroom . then , make a right turn and proceed to walk past the table . continue walking until you reach the chairs and wait by one of the chairs .

leave the bathroom and make a right turn . walk past the table and chairs , continuing straight ahead . take another right turn and continue walking until you reach the white chair . stand next to the white chair and wait there .
once you have finished using the bathroom , exit and take a right . proceed down the hallway and make a left turn . then , wait at the entrance of the bedroom until someone joins you .
after exiting the bathroom , turn right and continue past the bed . then , turn right again and wait near the bed .
1 . exit the bathroom and turn right . 2 . continue walking past the table and chairs . 3 . turn right again . 4 . keep walking until you reach a chair . 5 . wait by the chair .
proceed past the sink and enter the bathroom . once inside , remain there and wait .
1 . once finished , leave the bathroom and make a right turn . 2 . proceed forward and pass the table and chairs . 3 . take another right turn and enter the room . 4 . finally , wait by the couches .
1 . leave the bathroom and make a right turn . 2 . continue past the bed and make a left turn . 3 . stop and wait near the bed .

walk out of the bedroom and make a right turn . continue walking until you reach the couch , then make another right turn . keep walking past the couch until you reach your desired destination and come to a stop .
from the bedroom , walk out and turn right . continue walking until you reach the couch and then walk past it . stop at the bottom of the stairs .

step 1: begin walking past the dining room table . step 2: continue walking until you reach the end of the table . step 3: turn left at the end of the table . step 4: walk until you reach the bathroom door on the left . step 5: stop and wait at the bathroom door .
walk past the dining room table until you reach the end , then turn left . continue walking until you reach the entrance of the kitchen area and wait there .
walk past the dining room table and turn left . continue walking until you reach the bathroom . once you are there , stop .

walk past the dining table on your left and continue straight . when you reach the sink , turn left and walk straight until you reach the doorway to the bathroom . stop in the doorway and wait for further instructions .
proceed forward past the dining room table and chairs , then make a right turn . continue walking until you reach the end of the table and stop .

1 . begin by walking past the dining room table and chairs . 2 . continue straight until you reach the end of the table . 3 . turn left and proceed towards the open door on the right . 4 . once you reach the open door , enter through it . 5 . stop at the threshold of the bathroom door and wait .
walk past the dining table and chairs until you reach the dining room table , then come to a stop .
walk past the dining room table and chairs and continue until you reach the dining table , then come to a stop .
walk past the dining room table and chairs , then turn right and continue walking until you reach the kitchen . stop in front of the kitchen area .
walk straight ahead , passing by the dining room table , and make a left turn . continue walking until you reach the pool table and stop near the front door .
walk past the dining room table and continue straight until you reach the bathroom door . stand in the doorway of the bathroom and wait .
in the hallway , continue straight past the dining room table and then turn left . proceed into the bathroom and come to a stop .
move past the dining table and chairs , and proceed to the counter .
walk past the dining room table and continue straight ahead until you reach the corner . then , turn left and walk past the stairs . keep going until you reach the fireplace and wait there .
after using the bathroom , turn to your left and walk past the dining room table and chairs . then , turn to your right and continue walking until you reach a designated spot to wait .
when you are finished in the bathroom , turn to your left and continue walking until you reach the desk . then , proceed to the chair located nearby and wait there .
leave the bathroom by turning left , then proceed to walk past the dining room table . stop and wait near the kitchen table .
after exiting the bathroom , turn left and proceed past the dining room table . continue walking until you reach the entrance of the living room and wait there .
1 . to exit the bathroom , turn to your left . 2 . proceed forward , passing the kitchen area . 3 . stop when you reach the end of the counter .

1 . exit the bathroom and turn right . 2 . walk past the desk on your right side . 3 . keep walking until you reach the end of the desk . 4 . turn right and continue walking . 5 . stop near the desk and wait for further instructions .
after exiting the bathroom , turn right and continue walking . keep going straight , passing the table and chairs , until you reach the second right . turn there and then stop .
turn left after exiting the bathroom and continue walking until you reach the dining room , then pass by the table and chairs . once you reach the entrance of the kitchen , stop and wait there .

exit the bathroom and turn left . continue walking until you reach the dining room . pass by the table and chairs , heading straight until you reach the end of the hallway . wait there for the person on your right .
after exiting the bathroom , turn right and continue walking until you reach the bed . stand and wait near the bed .
to complete this action , exit the bathroom and make a right turn . continue down the hallway until you reach the bedroom . once in the bedroom , turn right again and proceed to wait near the bed .

1 . exit the bathroom and make a right turn . 2 . continue walking straight , passing by the bed on your right . 3 . when you reach the end of the bed , make a right turn . 4 . stop and wait at the entrance of the room .
exit the bathroom and turn right . continue walking until you reach the bed , then make a left turn . stand in the doorway and wait .

after exiting the bathroom , turn right and continue walking past the bed . repeat this process three more times . then , turn right and walk straight until you reach the edge of the bed . stop at that point .
once you are done using the bathroom , exit and turn right into the bedroom . walk until you reach the bed and stop there .
upon exiting the bathroom , move to your right and enter the bedroom . make your way to the bed and stop .
1 . exit the bathroom and turn to the right . 2 . walk past the bed and continue straight . 3 . make another right turn and keep walking . 4 . enter the bedroom and stop .
exit the bathroom and take a few steps until you reach the foot of the bed . pause once you have reached the foot of the bed .
once you have finished using the bathroom , turn to your right and head down the hallway . take a right turn into the bedroom and then wait near the bed .
after using the bathroom , turn right and walk past the bed on your right . then , turn right again and wait at the entrance of the bathroom .
after exiting the bathroom , enter the bedroom and wait by the bed .
walk past the dining room table and chairs , heading towards the kitchen . when you reach the kitchen , stop and face the front .

as you walk past the dining room table and chairs , continue straight until you reach the end of the table . then , turn left and walk to the sink area . wait near the sink until further instructions .
turn to your right and take a few steps forward . continue straight and you will pass the bed on your left . turn left and enter the bedroom . once inside , wait on the first step of the stairs .
when walking , pass by the couch and then continue on by the dining room table and chairs . then , make your way to the kitchen doorway and stop there .
walk by or through the dining room area , passing the table and chairs , and then turn right . proceed into the kitchen and stop by the sink .
walk past the bed , making a left turn , and enter the bedroom . walk through the bedroom and into the bathroom , stopping once you have entered .
walk past the dining room table and chairs . then , turn left and continue walking until you reach the dining table . stop at the dining table .
turn to your right and walk past the dining room table and chairs . continue straight until you reach the hallway . once in the hallway , stop in front of the sink .
walk past the dining room table and chairs , keeping them to your right . continue straight until you reach the doorway to the living room .
leave the bedroom and enter the room to your right . once inside , stand near the bed and wait .
leave the bedroom and enter the room on the right . walk past the bed and enter the next room on the right . stop and wait near the bed .
walk past the dining room table and chairs until you reach the kitchen .
turn around and leave the bedroom . then , turn left and walk until you pass the bed . after that , turn left again and enter the bathroom . finally , please wait by the sink .
after exiting the bedroom , continue walking straight ahead until you reach the couch . once you have reached the couch , stand and wait there .

step 1: stand up from the bed and turn towards the bedroom door . step 2: walk towards the door , making sure to go around the bed . step 3: stop when you reach the doorway . step 4: stand in the doorway and wait .

walk past the dining room table and chairs , making sure to leave enough space between yourself and the furniture . continue walking until you reach the other end of the room and then wait for further instructions .
proceed past the dining room table and chairs , and stop at the white chair to wait .
walk past the bed and continue through the bathroom , stopping in the doorway .

turn your body so it is facing away from the table , then take steps to the right side and continue walking . keep moving past the dining room table and chairs , and make a right turn . walk by the dining table and chairs until you come to a complete stop .
after exiting the bathroom , turn right and continue walking until you reach the dining room table and chairs . from there , keep walking until you reach the entrance of the bathroom . wait there .
exit the bathroom and turn left . continue walking until you reach the couch , then walk past it . stop in the doorway ahead .
walk past the dining room table , continuing until you reach the chairs . once you have passed the table and chairs , stop your forward movement and come to a complete stop at one of the chairs .
leave the bathroom and make a right turn . proceed past the dining room and its furniture . then , go and stand by the couch and wait there .
leave the bathroom and walk straight ahead . stop once you reach the space between the two tables and the glass table .
exit the bathroom and turn left . continue walking until you reach the dining room table and chairs . stop in front of the door ahead of you .
exit the bathroom and turn right . continue walking past the dining room table and chairs until you reach the dining area . stop in front of the dining room .
turn left towards the dining room table and take a few steps to walk past it . continue straight until you reach the entrance of the kitchen and wait there .
walk beyond the bed , then make a left turn . continue to the stairs and ascend them . upon reaching the first step , pause and wait .
walk past the bed and turn left . continue past the sink and turn left . walk straight ahead and wait in the bathroom .
walk past the bed , going straight ahead , until you reach the bathroom . once you reach the bathroom , turn left and come to a stop .
navigate past the couch , then make a left turn . continue past the dining room table and chairs , and turn left again . proceed past the dining table and chairs , and pause .

leave the bedroom and take a right turn . continue walking until you reach the couch , then make another right turn . walk past the chair and turn right again . stop and wait at the entrance of the room .

first , turn your body to face the opposite direction and begin walking towards your left . as you approach the table , continue past it , making sure to go between the chair and the table . keep walking until you reach the dining room table and chairs . once you're past them , stop when you reach the couch and stand behind it .

walk straight past the couch , continue past the dining room table and chairs , then turn left . walk past the dining room table and chairs again , this time turning right . proceed to the designated location and wait there .

as you stand by the bed , take a left and continue walking until you reach the sink . then , make another left and pass by the sink and dryer . keep moving straight and stop at the doorway of the bathroom .
continue straight ahead past the bed , then make a right turn . continue walking past the couch until you reach the couch , then stop .
continue walking straight , passing the couch on your right . then , make a left turn . keep walking until you come to the dining table and chairs , and stop .
